Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS
REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Relates to authorizing funds to be transferred to the public transportation system operating assistance account and the metropolitan mass transportation operating assistance account
Summary: Relates to authorizing funds to be transferred to the public transportation system operating assistance account and the metropolitan mass transportation operating assistance account; and provides for the repeal of certain provisions upon the expiration thereof.
LawCode: Amd §§171-a & 1298, Tax L; amd §88-a, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law and the state finance law, in relation to authorizing funds to be transferred to the public transportation system operating assistance account and the metropolitan mass transportation operating assistance account
